message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This item is truly exceptional and offers unparalleled value, especially considering its worth to you stands at $10,000. I understand your interest and am eager to make this opportunity available to you. My proposal is to offer the product to you at a price of $9,500. This allows us both to benefit from this transaction while ensuring it remains within a fair and reasonable range. I believe this price reflects the quality and value of the product, while also providing an attractive deal for you. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.
